Introduction¶

esociallib helps to process XML instance documents that obey the esocial XML schema.

With esociallib (esociallib.py) you can write Python code to:

  • Parse an XML document that obeys the esocial XML schema, creating instances of the Python classes that represent the types defined in the esocial schema. These Python classes are defined in esociallib.py.
  • Create instances of classes that represent the types described in the esocial XML schema.
  • Write Python application code that uses the classes that represent esocial types.
  • Export the objects to an XML document.

Schemas¶

The esociallib.py module in this package was generated from the XML schemas in ./schemas.

generateDS.py¶

The esociallib.py module in this package was generated by generateDS.py. You can learn about generateDS.py here: http://www.rexx.com/~dkuhlman/generateDS.html
